name: fm
content:
FM noun
(RADIO)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] abbreviation for frequency modulation: a radio system for broadcasting that produces a very clear sound: on FM You can listen to the BBC World Service 24 hours a day on FM.FM radio They had an FM radio.
More examplesFewer examplesWhen we first got digital radio it sounded so much worse than FM.He enjoys listening to Jazz FM in his car.Popular Spanish-language FM stations include La Mega and Amor.

FM noun
(POLITICS)
[ C ]
  politics
  UK abbreviation for
first minister : The FM will make a statement later today. PM Theresa May met with FM Nicola Sturgeon.
More examplesFewer examplesThe FM proposed to cut 2% of public-sector staff.In 2014 Scotland got its first female FM.FM Carwyn Jones announced his intention to stand down.The deal was approved by Alex Salmond when he was FM.
